## Usethis setup

```{r dev-setup}
proj_dir <- rprojroot::find_root(".git/index")
pkg_dir <- file.path(proj_dir, "rkeops")
setwd(pkg_dir)
usethis::proj_set(pkg_dir, force = TRUE)
usethis::proj_sitrep()
```

## Reticulate config

```{r dev-reticulate}
# create virtualenv
reticulate::virtualenv_create("rkeops")
# install pykeops
reticulate::virtualenv_install("rkeops", "pykeops")
# activate python environment
reticulate::use_virtualenv(virtualenv = "rkeops", required = TRUE)
# check Python config
reticulate::py_config()
```
